verbose_text: Terpen glycosides from Cortex Moutan, the root bark of Paeonia suffruticosa, reduced inflammatory cytokines including IL-6, MCP-1, and intercellular adhesion molecule 1 (ICAM-1), in a rat model of diabetic nephropathy [XREF_BIBR].
